package.name: CP_CustomerUniversalPassword
package.summary: Set Universal Password from Admin to login with customer Email Address
package.description: This CommercePundit Extension give you facility to set Universal customer Password from BackEnd , So you can login in Any Customer account in FrontEnd using customer Email and using universal password.
package.notes: This CommercePundit Extension give you facility to set Universal customer Password from BackEnd , So you can login in Any Customer account in FrontEnd using customer Email and using universal password.
